text: Willy Sommer (15 February 1925 – 9 July 2001) was a Swiss football striker and later manager.Weltfussball ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2001 deaths Category:Swiss footballers Category:FC Solothurn players Category:Association football forwards Category:Swiss football managers Category:FC Solothurn managers Category:FC Fribourg managers Category:FC Winterthur managers Category:FC St. Gallen managers Category:FC Lugano managers Category:FC Wettingen managers
